tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
Doctors communication and explanations are very impressive.
Caring,and  gentle with a pleasant approach.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was suffering from this weird kind of pain in my jaws  neck and head for 2 years now ...it made my life miserable..I visited a lot of dentists but no one was able to diagnose my problem..I even checked with ENT , got an MRI for my brain done... nothing seemed to be helping me....on a friend's suggestion I visited Dr Kim ....she spoke to me about my eating , sleeping habits and posture...after a few examinations of my face,  my cause of my problem was diagnosed... treatment began and in a week's time it was also solved . I had been unnecessarily suffering for so long...The assurance that Dr.Kim gave and the depth of knowledge she has really helped me. Highly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: RCT - Single Sitting,Full Mouth Rehabilitation,Mouth Guard,Dental Crowns,Zirconia Crowns,
review: I highly recommend Kosmodent Dental Studio. I had a problem of severe tooth erosion because of teeth grinding and had lost almost 50% of enamel volume across all teeth, and I also had multiple cavities, one which was so deep that one other dentist told me there was no way to save it. I was treated by Dr Kim, and had a full mouth rehabilitation using Zirconium implants. I started with just a root canal, but took Dr Kim's advise to go for a full reconstruction which I realised is a good investment for the rest of my life. She didn't put any pressure on me and gave me all options. Now I have my smile from college days (I am 41 now) and a much better bite. A few years later, I might have had to go for expensive implants. Thank you Dr Kim.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: KosMoDent Dental Clinic is really a pioneer in providing best dental services to the patient. The way of understanding the issues and providing the best class services really amazed me. I had a wonderful experience with this clinic. I had teeth pain since several days for that I consulted several Doctors but did not get any complete solution. I went to KosMoDent clinic and explain them the issue which they analysed and provided perfect medication and my issue got resolved completely.  Thank You KosMoDent once again for all your help, understanding and support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Immediate Dentures,Dental Implant Fixing,Surgical Tooth Extraction,RCT - Root Canal Treatment, Teeth cleaning & polishing,
review: So basically my mother had to undergo a complete oral reconstruction as her tooth conditions were too bad. So we had consulted couple of doctors but were not satisfied until we met Dr. Kim. She suggested the best, economical, easy, painless, effective and quickest solution. The whole treatment just took us 2weeks while the other doctors quoted us atleast two months for the same treatment with 2x amount of the cost. She also was very friendly and approachable in terms of the explanations and coming up with quick alternative solutions. Also her finesse and skills are amazing. Most recommended. My mom is very happy with the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings,Pit and Fissure Sealant,Dental Checkup (General),Tooth Decay,
review:
I took my two sons, 8 and 10, for checkup and fillings to Dr. Kim. They were reluctant to come. But Dr. Kim was very friendly to them and made them comfortable.

She identified tooth decay, both in initial stages and later stages. She explained available solutions and pros and cons. Both of them got fillings and one of them had his molars sealed. She also discussed possible root cause for the issues.

She explained to the kids the problem with poor brushing. My son has improved his brushing technique after she explained it to him and has promised to drink at least 1.5 ltrs of water every day. This is the kind of personal connection and empathy that I like about her, ***** **** *** **** ****** ** ***********
I appreciate what she has done for my kids and feel lucky to have found her. Would recommend her to anyone looking for a trustworthy dentist.

review: Dr.Kim is very friendly and explains the exact problem we have. I had taken treatment with 3 different doctors prior to this for the same problem, but was a failure everytime. But Dr. Kim explained my problems and suggested the treatments in stages accordingly.... Since I had failed treatments earlier I was not confident to move further at each stage.... She waited patiently whenever I wanted to wait for some more time and makes me feel comfortable. She had to take multiple sittings than usual without charging any extra fees for the same.
It was a amicable experience. I was worried about complications of my wisdom tooth extraction but Dr. Kim gave me confidence and provided helpful counsel.
